body.p:
You can use the Generate Questions action from the AI Positron Assistant
Actions Overview category to ask the AI Positron to generate a list of questions from a DITA XML topic. This is an useful action to better understand to what questions asked by an end user the written topic may answer.

The Generate Questions AI action is incredibly useful to end users as it helps them gain a deeper understanding of a specific content. With this feature, the AI analyzes the content and generates thought-provoking questions related to the topic. These questions serve multiple purposes, such as encouraging critical thinking, enhancing comprehension, and promoting engagement with the material.
Open the topic and invoke the Generate Questions action.

You can use the Answer Questions action from the AI Positron Assistant
Actions Overview category to ask the AI Positron to understand the contents of a DITA XML topic and then to answer to questions asked about it.
The Answer Questions action is useful to better understand if the written topic may answer a specific question the user may have.
Open the topic and invoke the Answer Questions action. Afterwards ask the AI questions about the topic, for example:

ul.li: Which media resources can be added to DITA, DocBook, or XHTML topics?
How to insert and configure a reference to a media resource in Author mode?
What the toolbar button allows you to do when adding media resources in Author mode?
What to do if videos do not play in Author mode on Ubuntu 17.10?
How the publishing stage converts the media object for proper rendering in HTML5-based outputs?
